_header: Shall I that heaven and earth did make
Title(s): The Child Jesus to the Virgin Mary
_description: James Ryman, The Child Jesus to the Virgin Mary — nine quatrains (abab) with the first repeated after each of the remaining nine as if a burden: ‘Shalle I that heuene & erthe did make / Dere moder shall I soo / Shall I die for mannes sake / and suffre payne and woo’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Shalle I that hevene & erthe did makeDere moder shall I
                    sooShall I die for mannes sakeAnd suffre payne and wooShalle I
                    honge vppon the RooseLike as it is my wille…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…And bringe man to that blis for ayWhere ioy shall nevir
                    mys
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 228-9.
